name: Excel
overview: A zero, one or two player board style game created by Ken Smith. This is a section of the 4x4 grid. Is your brain powerful? You will soon find out. Can you Excel? Each move you make adds part of an engine to a square in the 4x4 grid. You score points by getting patterns on the grid. Getting a line of the same part scores 30 points. You add the parts in sequence. Making a complete train backwards or forwards scores 15 points. If you complete a square and both players have parts of the engine you score 30 points. To make a move you enter the grid position. E.G. B2. If you believe you have a point scoring move then press Y to claim.
